newsletter.title: newsletter
newsletter.description: 請訂閱我們的資訊，我們將向您發送訂閱者限定的情報，例如配搭晚餐和活動等訊息。

about-narai.title: 山之水，
about-narai.subtitle: 最接近天空的酒
about-narai.body: 我們的酒是在海拔940米上，日本少數被大自然眷顧的環境下釀製。許多的酒廠都使用穩定性較高的井水，而narai則使用海拔1,000米以上的天然山水。源自信濃川和木曾川的分水點附近的山水是日本少數擁有「硬度25以下」的特徵，因此有透明感，口感圓潤和順滑。

location.title: 長野
location.subtitle: 奈良井宿で醸す
location.body: 位於長野縣被稱為日本最長的宿場町「奈良井宿」的歷史街區裡釀造。奈良井的冬季氣溫會降至零下20度，山水會結冰。寒冬過後，周圍新長的綠意盎然，空氣清新宜人的季節接踵而來。秋季時，紅葉令山林染上鮮艷的顏色。這個地方具有日本特色的四季，讓人感愛到大自然之美。

bar.body: 這裡是我們直接經營的店鋪，除了存貨和出貨工作外（sagyo），還融合了由日本酒移動銷售車「suginomori wagon」提供能享受日本酒的酒吧（bar）。距離酒廠步行約1分鐘。鐵路對面的倉庫也進行了翻新。

concept.title: 釀造的前景
concept.body: 我們的信念是傳承日本酒文化。為了這個目標，我們重新審視過去的常識，並挑戰新的嘗試。在釀造的新境界上，運用自由的想像探究日本酒，將它的魅力傳揚下去。

newsletter.promo: 我哋會寄送俾您一啲只係俾訂閱者嘅獨家資訊同埋搭配晚宴嘅通知。

cart.title: ショッピングカード
cart.subtitle: ご注文内容の確認
cart.declinedCard: 購入手続きができませんでした。カード情報をご確認の上、再度お試しください。
cart.thankYou: この度はご注文ありがとうございました。
cart.taxCalculation: チェックアウト時に計算されます
cart.shippingCalculation: チェックアウト時に計算されます
cart.proceed: チェックアウトに進む
cart.continue: ショッピングを続ける
cart.notePlaceholder: 注文時に添えるメモを入力してください
cart.addNote: 注文にメモを追加します

age-gate.title: 年齢確認
age-gate.description: 当サイトでのご購入には、お客さまがアルコール飲料を購入できる年齢であることの確認が必要となります。
age-gate.birthdate: 生年月日を入力してください。

002.title: 在長野 奈良井宿釀造
002.para001: 我們在海拔940米的日本少數著名高空附近的自然環境下釀造。冬季氣溫會降至接近零下20度，山水會結冰。寒冬過後，周圍新長的綠意盎然，空氣清新宜人的季節接踵而來。秋季時，紅葉令山林染上鮮艷的顏色。一個能感受日本四季的地方。
002.para002: 我們希望通過味道來展現這片大自然豐富的魅力。 一般的酒廠都是以大型團隊利用大型酒桶（3,000升〜8,000升等）進行大規模分工生產。然而，在我們的酒廠裡，即使只有一位釀酒師，也會通過精密的手工有效率地參與整個生產過程。雖然是小批量的生產，但是我們採用900升和1,800升的小型酒桶來確保高品質的釀造。此外，大多數的酒廠只在冬季釀造，但是為了將自然的美融入味道裡，我們採取可以全年四季都能生產的釀造方式。

003.title: 多彩的黑 – 釀造的理念
003.para001: 「多彩」和「黑」聽起來互相矛盾，但我所追求「多彩的黑」並不是只有一種顏色，而是通過使用不同顏料細緻地交疊而成的顏色。在每次釀造中都會配合山水和米的狀態並通過經驗由人手調配口感，豐滿度，辛辣味，甜味和香氣等元素，以追求整體上協調一致的同時，在口中展開時也能感受到多色多彩。請務必享受信州最高級的自然美譽「山之水，最接近天空的酒」。

water.title: 水 –
water.subtitle: 基礎
water.body: 許多的酒廠都使用穩定性較高的井水，而narai則使用海拔1,000米以上的天然山水。源自信濃川和木曾川的分水點附近的山水是日本少數擁有「硬度25以下」的特徵，因此有透明感，口感圓潤和順滑。

rice.title: 米 –
rice.subtitle: 幹部
rice.body: 我們採用了在長野縣安曇野區，受「日本阿爾卑斯山」恩惠的Farm Ichimaru精心種植的稻米。農家非常重視當地生產的稻米，釀酒師對酒米十分講究，會親自到農家跟他們交流和種植，以嚴格挑選優質的米。

koji.title: 酵母和麹 -
koji.subtitle: 構成要素（發酵）
koji.body: 我們使用產自長野的協會第7號酵母，它具有強大的發酵能力和能將香氣變得優雅。由米變糖的麹菌，也採用有良好均衡的酵素力品種。

irie.title: 釀酒師︰入江将之
irie.body: 在福岡出生。由於對料理和日本酒的配搭產生興趣，在佐賀縣的富久千代酒廠工作。之後入江對酵母菌產生興趣，在石川縣的鹿野酒造和注重原料的兵庫縣的本田商店累積經驗。30歲時，入江意識到日本酒的品牌形象十分重要，在京都府的松本酒造擔任當時釀酒師松本出彥的助手5年。獲得這些經驗後，入江以獨特的觀點加入杉之森酒造，致力創造獨特的日本酒。

001.para001: 這裡是我們直接經營的店鋪，除了存貨和出貨工作外 (sagyo)，還融合了由日本酒移動銷售車「suginomori wagon」提供能享受日本酒的酒吧。
001.para002: 翻新過的倉庫原本是前任的杉之森酒造用於保管器材和工作用品。我們保留了倉庫的建築，更新了入口的閘門，新增了燈光和空調等設備。倉庫內採用酒廠用來搬運酒瓶的包裝容器「P箱」。P箱的設置是很隨意，在店舖裡也能用到。

bar.002: 遊覽奈良井宿的客人不僅可以品嚐由相鄰的酒廠釀造的narai，還可以參加音樂活動和工作坊等活動。通過利用不同的場景，我們希望能成為奈良井宿的觀光景點之一。

003.title: suginomori wagon
003.body: 在sagyobar，我們設置裝有日本酒機器的移動銷售車「suginomori wagon」，提供narai品酒套餐，地區限定菜單和原創商品。販賣車作為一個移動的銷售空間，除了在sagyobar使用外，還會在長野縣內，甚至日本全國各地不同的活動中提供narai的服務。

access.title: 營業資訊
access.para004: JR中央本線 由奈良井站步行4分鐘
access.para006: 由塩尻I.C駕駛35分鐘/由伊那I.C駕駛40分鐘

hours.title: 營業時間
hours.para001: 基本上是不定期營業，逄星期五和六下午1時至5時開店
hours.para002: ※如在其他日子遇到職員可隨意詢問。
hours.para003: ※本店不會向司機和未成年銷售含酒精飲料。

menu.title: 餐單
menu.para001: メニューはこちら（※PDFリンク）からご覧ください。

clerk.title: 領班︰西川正貴
clerk.001: 在廣島出生。從事製造管理，銷售管理，酒稅管理，總務，推銷等工作，身邊的人都說「有事就找西川」，是一個值得信賴的伙伴。
clerk.002: 西川在2006年加入京都府的松本酒造，擔任助手多年後，在2021年加入杉之森酒造。他致力於為釀酒師提供最能集中的環境和處理日常業務。

concept.title: 釀造的前景
concept.para001: 我們的信念是傳承日本酒文化。
concept.para002: 為了這個目標，我們重新審視過去的常識，並挑戰新的嘗試。
concept.para003: 在釀造的新境界上，運用自由的想像探究日本酒，將它的魅力傳揚下去。
concept.para004: 位於長野縣被稱為日本最長的宿場町「奈良井宿」的歷史街區中，老字號酒廠「杉之森酒造」於1793年創立，2012年進入休業狀態。直到2021年，將生產面積縮小至原來的1/3，並加入全新的設備，以「suginomori brewery」名義再出發。
concept.para005: 在重新出發的過程中，我們意識到近年日本酒在日本國內的需求下降，對地區生活有緊密關係的酒廠愈來愈少，導致放棄耕作的土地增加，加上一般的酒廠只在冬季釀酒令到工作不穩定等問題，我們酒廠都會真誠地面對這些難題。
concept.para006: 我們直接與農家溝通，親自走入農田，從種米開始一起參與。
concept.para007: 導入全年四季都能釀酒的釀造方式，實現了一個穩定的釀造環境。
concept.para008: 雖然只是微細的努力，但我們相信只要累積這些努力一定會對未來產生很大的影響。
concept.para009: 此外，另一個相關的挑戰是開設「開放的酒廠」。我們酒廠與同一地方內的傳統民居和舊酒廠改建的住宿設施（BYAKU Narai）的餐廳相鄰。透過一塊大玻璃，能夠近距離見到平時難以見到的釀造過程，相信這會是引起對日本酒感興趣的契機。
concept.para010: 最後，我們的品牌【narai】寓意着透過我們的酒，令世界的人認識到奈良井宿的魅力，並親自去當地體驗。如果到奈良井時，請一定到suginomori brewery參觀。

collectingAndUsing.title: Collecting and Using Personal Data
collectingAndUsing.inScope: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to your email address, your first and last name, phone number, address, state, province, postal code, city

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.deviceInfo: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service. Usage Data may include information such as your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g., IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
usageData.mobileInfo: When you access the Service by or through a mobile device, we may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
usageData.browserInfo: We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service or when you access the Service by or through a mobile device.

cookies.title: Data Tracking and Cookies
cookies.trackers: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service.
cookies.doNotAccept: You can instruct your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept Cookies, you may not be able to use some parts of our Service.

usage.intro: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:
usage.maintain: To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service.
usage.performance: For the performance of a contract, including the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services you have purchased or of any other contract with us through the Service.
usage.contact: To contact you by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.
usage.requests: To attend and manage your requests to us.

sharing.title: We may share your personal information in the following situations:
sharing.monitor: We may share your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to show advertisements to you to help support and maintain our Service, to advertise on third party websites to you after you visited our Service, for payment processing, to contact you.
sharing.merger: We may share or transfer your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company.
sharing.affiliates: We may share your information with our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that we control or that are under common control with us.
sharing.businessPartners: We may share your information with our business partners to offer you certain products, services or promotions.
sharing.socialMedia: When you share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside. If you interact with other users or register through a Third-Party Social Media Service, your contacts on the Third-Party Social Media Service may see your name, profile, pictures and description of your activity. Similarly, other users will be able to view descriptions of your activity, communicate with you and view your profile.

retention.title: Retention of Personal Data
retention.asNecessary: We will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
retention.internalAnalysis: The Company may also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of our Service, or we are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods.

transfer.title: Transfers of Personal Data
transfer.transborder: Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to devices located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction. Your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer.

disclosure.title: Disclosure of Personal Data
disclosure.merger: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before your Personal Data is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy.
disclosure.mandatory: Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency).
disclosure.goodFaith: The Company may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with a legal obligation, protect and defend the rights or property of the Company, prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service, protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public, protect against legal liability.
disclosure.noGuarantee: No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

processing.title: Processing of Personal Data
processing.limitedUse: Service Providers have access to your Personal Data only to perform their tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

thirdParties.intro: We may use third-party Service providers to:
thirdParties.monitor: monitor and analyze the use of our Service.
thirdParties.marketing: to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to you.
thirdParties.services: provide paid products and/or services to you from within the Service.
thirdParties.protection: Protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public.
thirdParties.ads: to advertise on third party websites to you after you visited our Service.

processing.creditCards: We will not store or collect your payment card details. That information is provided directly to our third-party payment processors whose use of your personal information is governed by their Privacy Policy.
processing.cookies: We and our third-party vendors use cookies to inform, optimize and serve ads based on your past visits to our Service.

mobile.title: Mobile Devices
mobile.optOut: Your mobile device may give you the ability to opt out of the use of information about the apps you use in order to serve you ads that are targeted to your interests. You can also stop the collection of location information from your mobile device by changing the preferences on your mobile device.

doNotTrack.title: Do Not Track Policy
doNotTrack.noResponse: Our Service does not respond to Do Not Track signals.
doNotTrack.browser: However, some third party websites do keep track of your browsing activities. If you are visiting such websites, you can set your preferences in your web browser to inform websites that you do not want to be tracked. You can enable or disable DNT by visiting the preferences or settings page of your web browser.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.external: Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
links.disclaimer: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.updates: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. The current Privacy Policy will always be available on this page.
changes.review: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.questions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us by email at

price.label: 商品の販売価格
price.value: 各商品ページをご参照ください。

paymentMethod.label: 支払方法
paymentMethod.value: クレジットカード決済

paymentPeriod.label: 支払時期
paymentPeriod.value: クレジットカード決済：商品注文時にお支払いが確定します。

delivery.label: 商品の引渡時期
delivery.value: ご注文確認後、直ちに商品を発送いたします。（通常、商品の発送までに3営業日前後の時間がかかります。天候不順や配送業者の都合、その他何らかの理由により商品の発送が遅延する場合は、メールにてお知らせいたします。）

returnsAndExchanges.label: 返品・交換
returnsAndExchanges.one: お客さま都合による返品・交換は対応いたしかねますので予めご了承ください。商品の欠陥による返品・交換は、商品到着後7日以内にご購入者のお名前・住所を送り状に明記の上、下記住所まで着払いにてご返送ください。

001.label: 販売場の名称及び所在地

002.label: 酒類販売管理者の氏名

003.label: 酒類販売管理研修受講年月日

005.label: 研修実施団体名
005.value: 一般社団法人　日本ボランタリーチェーン協会
